metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0644 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[vfs: check fd has read access in kernel_read_file_from_fd()]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-0644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-23.23
linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.13.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic-64k - 5.13.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-lowlatency - 5.13.0-23.23
No subscription required
